column5: I hope I will have some nice pictures for you all when I get back.......
Really?  Same here, what part of the lake will you be staying on?  Joey

I will be staying at Lavalley Bay cottages close to mouth of Dog bay with there will be about 20 guys more swillin and poker than fishing for most but I will spend most of my time on the lake.....it looks like it will be cool weather where wil you be?
We will also be near Lavelley Bay I believe, on Paradise Landing Road in Blue Heron Cottage.  Is that close?  Joey

Is blue heron on an island if so I stayed there once and it is in Lavalley bay proper at the NE portion of the lake     Dog Bay is south then turn W at the marina about 10kms away from there PM me if you want some spots I have fished this lake for many years. I am in a white Starcraft with a Merc 25 if you see me out ther say hello.
